headline: Becton Dickinson Reshapes Portfolio With Waters Deal And Recycling Progress
summary: Becton Dickinson (NYSE:BDX) is spinning off its Biosciences & Diagnostic Solutions business, which will combine with Waters Corporation after shareholder and regulatory approvals. The transaction will give existing BD shareholders a significant stake in the new entity, reshaping the company’s overall business mix. BD has also completed a pilot project to recycle medical polystyrene Petri dishes into new manufacturing feedstock, targeting greater circularity in healthcare plastics. Becton...
